Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: The Page Editor is the main view that allows to add, arrange and edit contents on a page. Moreover, it provides access to all necessary user tasks like sitemap manipulation, publishing, and file attribute or property handling.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Viewing a page offline, you see the page editor. It allows to add, arrange and edit contents on a page and provides access to all necessary user tasks.
